 18912                                  
 18913                                  ;Break	<REN_DEL_Check - check for access for rename and delete>
 18914                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18915                                  ; Procedure Name : REN_DEL_Check
 18916                                  ;
 18917                                  ; Inputs:
 18918                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 18919                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX points to entry
 18920                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI points to firclus field of entry
 18921                                  ;	[WFP_Start] points to name
 18922                                  ; Function:
 18923                                  ;	Check for Exclusive access on given file.
 18924                                  ;	  Used by RENAME, SET_FILE_INFO, and DELETE.
 18925                                  ; Outputs:
 18926                                  ;	ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 18927                                  ;	NOTE: The WFP string pointed to by [WFP_Start] Will be Modified. The
 18928                                  ;		last element will be loaded from the directory entry. This is
 18929                                  ;		so the name given to the sharer doesn't have any meta chars in
 18930                                  ;		it.
 18931                                  ;	Carry set if sharing violation, INT 24H generated
 18932                                  ;	    NOTE THAT AX IS NOT error_sharing_violation.
 18933                                  ;		This is because input AX is preserved.
 18934                                  ;		Caller must set the error if needed.
 18935                                  ;	Carry clear
 18936                                  ;		OK
 18937                                  ; AX,DS,BX,SI,DI preserved
 18938                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18939                                  
 18940                                  	; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18941                                  	
 18942                                  REN_DEL_Check:
 18943                                  
 18944 00002C74 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 18945 00002C75 57                      	PUSH	DI
 18946 00002C76 50                      	PUSH	AX
 18947 00002C77 53                      	PUSH	BX
 18948 00002C78 56                      	PUSH	SI		; Save CURBUF pointers
 18949                                  	
 18950 00002C79 16                      	push	ss
 18951 00002C7A 07                      	pop	es
 18952                                  
 18953                                  ;hkn; context ES will assume ES to DOSDATA
 18954                                  ;hkn; ASSUME	ES:DOSGROUP
 18955                                  
 18956                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18957 00002C7B 368B3E[B205]            	MOV	DI,[SS:WFP_START] ; ES:DI -> WFP
 18958 00002C80 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 18959                                  
 18960                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18961 00002C82 368E1E[E405]            	MOV	DS,[SS:CURBUF+2] ; DS:SI -> entry (FCB style name)
 18962 00002C87 89FB                    	MOV	BX,DI		; Set backup limit for skipback
 18963                                  	;ADD	BX,2		; Skip over d: to point to leading '\'
 18964                                  	; 31/01/2024
 18965 00002C89 43                      	inc	bx
 18966 00002C8A 43                      	inc	bx
 18967 00002C8B E82CEB                  	call	StrLen		; CX is length of ES:DI including NUL
 18968 00002C8E 49                      	DEC	CX		; Don't include nul in count
 18969 00002C8F 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX		; Point to NUL at end of string
 18970 00002C91 E8E64D                  	call	SkipBack	; Back up one element
 18971 00002C94 47                      	INC	DI		; Point to start of last element
 18972                                  
 18973                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18974                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18975                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18976 00002C95 36893E[0106]            	MOV	[SS:SAVE_BX],DI	;IFS. save for DOS_RENAME   ;AN000;
 18977                                  	;
 18978 00002C9A E8C0F9                  	call	PackName	; Transfer name from entry to ASCIZ tail.
 18979 00002C9D 5E                      	POP	SI		; Get back entry pointers
 18980 00002C9E 5B                      	POP	BX
 18981 00002C9F 53                      	PUSH	BX
 18982 00002CA0 56                      	PUSH	SI		; Back on stack
 18983                                  	
 18984 00002CA1 16                      	push	ss
 18985 00002CA2 1F                      	pop	ds
 18986                                  
 18987                                  ;hkn; context DS will assume ES to DOSDATA
 18988                                  ;hkn; ASSUME	DS:DOSGROUP
 18989                                  
 18990                                  	; 07/07/2024
 18991                                  	;push	es              ; (not necessary) ; 31/01/2024
 18992                                  	;push	di
 18993                                  
 18994                                  ; Close the file if possible by us.
 18995                                  ;
 18996                                  ;if installed
 18997 00002CA3 FF1E[C400]              	Call	far [JShare+(13*4)] ; 13 = ShCloseFile
 18998                                  ;else
 18999                                  ;	Call	ShCloseFile
 19000                                  ;endif
 19001                                  	;;;
 19002                                  	; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19003                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 19004 00002CA7 803E[0303]FF            	cmp	byte [fShare],0FFh
 19005 00002CAC 750A                    	jne	short rdc_1
 19006 00002CAE 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es
 19007 00002CB2 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di
 19008 00002CB6 EB0A                    	jmp	short rdc_2
 19009                                  rdc_1:
 19010                                  	;;;
 19011 00002CB8 8C1E[A005]              	MOV	[THISSFT+2],DS
 19012                                  
 19013                                  ;hkn; AUXSTACK is in DOSDATA
 19014 00002CBC C706[9E05][6507]        	MOV	word [THISSFT],AUXSTACK-SF_ENTRY.size  ; RENAMEDMA+(384-59)
 19015                                  				; Scratch space
 19016                                  rdc_2:		; 30/01/2024
 19017                                  	; 07/07/2024
 19018                                  	;pop	di
 19019                                  	;pop	es
 19020                                  	;
 19021 00002CC2 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Indicate file to DOOPEN (high bit off)
 19022 00002CC4 E8C425                  	call	DOOPEN		; Fill in SFT for share check
 19023 00002CC7 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 19024                                  	;mov	word [es:di+2],10h
 19025 00002CCB 26C745021000            	MOV	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_DENY_BOTH ; 10h
 19026                                  				; requires exclusive access
 19027                                  	;MOV	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],1 ; Pretend open
 19028 00002CD1 26C7050100              	mov	word [ES:DI],1
 19029 00002CD6 E8EB53                  	call	ShareEnter
 19030 00002CD9 720D                    	jc	short CheckDone
 19031 00002CDB C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 19032                                  	;MOV	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0
 19033 00002CDF 26C7050000              	mov	word [ES:DI],0	; Pretend closed and free
 19034                                  	
 19035 00002CE4 E8D853                  	call	ShareEnd	; Tell sharer we're done with THISSFT
 19036 00002CE7 F8                      	CLC
 19037                                  CheckDone:
 19038 00002CE8 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 19039 00002CEC 5E                      	POP	SI
 19040 00002CED 5B                      	POP	BX
 19041 00002CEE 58                      	POP	AX
 19042 00002CEF 5F                      	POP	DI
 19043 00002CF0 1F                      	POP	DS
 19044 00002CF1 C3                      	retn

 19060                                  ;
 19061                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19062                                  
 19063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19064                                  ;
 19065                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 19066                                  ;
 19067                                  ; Inputs:
 19068                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19069                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19070                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 19071                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19072                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19073                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19074                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19075                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19076                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19077                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19078                                  ; Function:
 19079                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 19080                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 19081                                  ; Outputs:
 19082                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19083                                  ;	    OK
 19084                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19085                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19086                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19087                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 19088                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 19089                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 19090                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19091                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 19092                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 19093                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 19094                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 19095                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19096                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19097                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19098                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19099                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19100                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19101                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19102                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 19103                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19104                                  ;
 19105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19106                                  
 19107                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19108                                  	; 31/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19109                                  
 19110                                  DOS_RENAME:
 19111                                  
 19112                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up
 19113                                  ;hkn; at this point to DOSDATA.
 19114                                  
 19115 00002CF2 E825EB                  	call	TestNet
 19116 00002CF5 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_RENAME
 19117                                  
 19118                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19119                                  ;	transfer NET_RENAME
 19120                                  ;ELSE
 19121                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 19122                                  	;INT	2FH
 19123                                  	;return
 19124                                  
 19125 00002CF7 B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 19126 00002CFA CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 19127                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 19128                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 19129                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19130                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19131 00002CFC C3                      	retn
 19132                                  ;ENDIF
 19133                                  
 19134                                  LOCAL_RENAME:
 19135 00002CFD C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk ; 2
 19136 00002D02 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 19137 00002D06 8B3E[B405]              	MOV	DI,[REN_WFP]
 19138 00002D0A 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 19139 00002D0C 8A25                    	MOV	AH,[DI]
 19140 00002D0E 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020H		; Lower case
 19141 00002D11 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH
 19142 00002D13 7405                    	JZ	short SAMEDRV
 19143 00002D15 B81100                  	MOV	AX,error_not_same_device ; 11h
 19144 00002D18 F9                      	STC
 19145 00002D19 C3                      	retn
 19146                                  
 19147                                  SAMEDRV:
 19148 00002D1A FF36[2E03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19149 00002D1E FF36[2C03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD]
 19150 00002D22 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	[DMAADD+2],DS
 19151                                  
 19152                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19153 00002D26 C706[2C03][2006]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],RENAMEDMA
 19154 00002D2C C606[7005]00            	MOV	byte [FOUND_DEV],0	; Rename fails on DEVS, assume not a dev
 19155 00002D31 E864EB                  	call	ECritDisk
 19156 00002D34 E81A07                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST	; Sets [NoSetDir] to 1, [CURBUF+2]:BX
 19157                                  					;    points to entry
 19158 00002D37 7314                    	JNC	short Check_Dev
 19159 00002D39 83F812                  	CMP	AX,error_no_more_files ; 12h
 19160 00002D3C 7503                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19161 00002D3E B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found ; 2
 19162                                  GOTERR:
 19163 00002D41 F9                      	STC
 19164                                  RENAME_POP:
 19165 00002D42 8F06[2C03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD]
 19166 00002D46 8F06[2E03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19167                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19168                                  	;retn
 19169                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19170 00002D4A E978EB                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19171                                  
 19172                                  Check_Dev:
 19173                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19174                                  	;mov	ax,5
 19175 00002D4D B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; Assume error
 19176                                  	
 19177                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19178 00002D50 1E                      	PUSH	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19179 00002D51 C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		      ;PTM.  check if source a dir  ;AN000;
 19180                                  	;add	si,21
 19181 00002D55 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19182                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19183 00002D58 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;PTM.	    ;AN000;
 19184 00002D5C 7407                    	JZ	short notdir		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19185 00002D5E 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		      ;PTM.  if yes, make sure path ;AN000;
 19186 00002D62 E8A5FA                  	call	Check_PathLen2		      ;PTM.   length < 67	    ;AN000;
 19187                                  notdir:
 19188 00002D65 1F                      	POP	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19189 00002D66 77D9                    	JA	short GOTERR		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19190                                  
 19191                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19192 00002D68 803E[7005]00            	CMP	byte [FOUND_DEV],0
 19193 00002D6D 75D2                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19194                                  
 19195                                  ; At this point a source has been found. There is search continuation info (a
 19196                                  ; la DOS_SEARCH_NEXT) for the source at RENAMEDMA, together with the first
 19197                                  ; directory entry found.
 19198                                  ; [THISCDS], [THISDPB], and [THISDRV] are set and will remain correct
 19199                                  ; throughout the RENAME since it is known at this point that the source and
 19200                                  ; destination are both on the same device.
 19201                                  ; [SATTRIB] is also set.
 19202                                  
 19203 00002D6F 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19204                                  	;add	si,26
 19205 00002D71 83C61A                  	ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first
 19206 00002D74 E8FDFE                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19207 00002D77 7305                    	JNC	short REN_OK1
 19208 00002D79 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 19209 00002D7C EBC4                    	JMP	short RENAME_POP
 19210                                  
 19211                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19212                                  ; Check if the source is a file or directory. If file, delete the entry
 19213                                  ; from the Fastopen cache. If directory, rename it later
 19214                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19215                                  
 19216                                  REN_OK1:				;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
 19217                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19218                                  	; 31/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19219                                  	;PUSH	SI
 19220 00002D7E C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;BN00X; PTM. check if source a dir ;AN000;
 19221                                  	;add	si,21
 19222 00002D82 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	;;BN00XPTM.P5520		;AN000;
 19223                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19224 00002D85 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;;BN00XPTM. ;AN000;
 19225                                  	;JZ	short NOT_DIR1		;;BN00XPTM.			;AN000;
 19226 00002D89 7500                    	jnz	short SWAP_SOURCE ; 31/01/2024
 19227                                  	;POP	SI			;BN00X
 19228                                  	;JMP	SHORT SWAP_SOURCE	;BN00X
 19229                                  ;NOT_DIR1:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19230                                  	;POP	SI
 19231                                  
 19232                                  	; 03/03/2025
 19233                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19234                                  	;call	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 19235                                  
 19236                                  SWAP_SOURCE:
 19237                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19238                                  	;MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]
 19239                                  	;MOV	[WFP_START],SI
 19240                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19241 00002D8B A1[B205]                	MOV	AX,[WFP_START]		; Swap source and destination
 19242 00002D8E 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		; Swap source and destination
 19243 00002D92 8936[B205]              	MOV	[WFP_START],SI		; WFP_START = Destination path
 19244 00002D96 A3[B405]                	MOV	[REN_WFP],AX		; REN_WFP   = Source path
 19245                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19246 00002D99 C706[B605]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1	; No current dir on dest
 19247                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 19248 00002D9F C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0FFh  ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 19249                                  					; A rename is like a CREATE_NEW as far
 19250                                  					; as the destination is concerned.
 19251 00002DA5 E8D81B                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 19252                                  
 19253                                  ;   If this GETPATH fails due to file not found, we know all renames will work
 19254                                  ;   since no files match the destination name. If it fails for any other
 19255                                  ;   reason, the rename fails on a path not found, or whatever (also fails if
 19256                                  ;   we find a device or directory). If the GETPATH succeeds, we aren't sure
 19257                                  ;   if the rename should fail because we haven't built an explicit name by
 19258                                  ;   substituting for the meta chars in it. In this case the destination file
 19259                                  ;   spec with metas is in [NAME1] and the explicit source name is at RENAMEDMA
 19260                                  ;   in the directory entry part.
 19261                                  	
 19262 00002DA8 722A                    	JC	short NODEST
 19263                                  	
 19264                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19265                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC 		; Dest string is a directory	;AC000;
 19266                                  	; !! MSDOS 3.3 !!
 19267                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC ; !!	; Dest string is a directory
 19268                                  
 19269 00002DAA 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Device?
 19270 00002DAC 7933                    	JNS	short SAVEDEST		; No, continue
 19271                                  BAD_ACC:
 19272 00002DAE B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 19273 00002DB1 F9                      	STC
 19274                                  RENAME_CLEAN:
 19275 00002DB2 9C                      	PUSHF				; Save carry state
 19276 00002DB3 50                      	PUSH	AX			; and error code (if carry set)
 19277                                  	;;;
 19278                                  	; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19279                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19280 00002DB4 C42E[8A05]              	les	bp,[THISDPB]
 19281 00002DB8 E8E405                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 19282                                  	;;;
 19283 00002DBB A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 19284 00002DBE E83339                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 19285 00002DC1 58                      	POP	AX
 19286 00002DC2 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 19287 00002DC7 7504                    	JNZ	short BAD_ERR		; User FAILed to I 24
 19288 00002DC9 9D                      	POPF
 19289 00002DCA E975FF                  	JMP	RENAME_POP
 19290                                  
 19291                                  BAD_ERR:
 19292 00002DCD 58                      	POP	AX			; Saved flags
 19293                                  	; 16/12/202
 19294                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19295                                  BAD_PATH: ; *
 19296 00002DCE B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 19297 00002DD1 E96DFF                  	JMP	GOTERR
 19298                                  
 19299                                  NODEST:
 19300 00002DD4 75F8                    	JNZ	short BAD_PATH
 19301 00002DD6 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 19302 00002DDB 75F1                    	JNZ	short BAD_PATH		; Search for dest failed 
 19303                                  					; because user FAILed on I 24
 19304                                  	; 14/11/2022
 19305 00002DDD 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 19306                                  	;JNZ	short SAVEDEST
 19307                                  	; 17/05/2019
 19308 00002DDF 74ED                    	jz	short BAD_PATH ; *
 19309                                  ;BAD_PATH: ; *
 19310                                  ;	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 19311                                  ;	;STC
 19312                                  ;	;JMP	RENAME_POP
 19313                                  ;	; 17/05/2019
 19314                                  ;	jmp	GOTERR 
 19315                                  
 19316                                  ; 16/12/2022
 19317                                  %if 0
 19318                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19319                                  	or	cl,cl
 19320                                  	jnz	short SAVEDEST
 19321                                  	;jz	short BAD_PATH ; *
 19322                                  BAD_PATH: ; *
 19323                                  	;mov	ax,3
 19324                                  	mov	ax,error_path_not_found
 19325                                  	stc
 19326                                  	jmp	RENAME_POP
 19327                                  %endif
 19328                                  
 19329                                  SAVEDEST:
 19330 00002DE1 16                      	push	ss
 19331 00002DE2 07                      	pop	es
 19332                                  
 19333                                  ;hkn; NAME1 & NAME2 is in DOSDATA
 19334 00002DE3 BF[5705]                	MOV	DI,NAME2
 19335 00002DE6 BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1
 19336                                  
 19337 00002DE9 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 19338 00002DEC F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB			; Save dest with metas at NAME2
 19339                                  	;;;
 19340                                  	; 31/01/2024
 19341                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19342 00002DEE A1[DC0A]                	mov	ax,[DIRSTART_HW]
 19343 00002DF1 A3[E60A]                	mov	[DESTSTART_HW],ax
 19344                                  	;;;
 19345 00002DF4 A1[C205]                	MOV	AX,[DIRSTART]
 19346 00002DF7 A3[6405]                	MOV	[DESTSTART],AX
 19347                                  BUILDDEST:
 19348                                  	; 31/01/2024
 19349                                  	;push	ss
 19350                                  	;pop	es			; needed due to JMP BUILDDEST below
 19351                                  
 19352                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA, NAME1, NAME2 in DOSDATA
 19353 00002DFA BB[3506]                	MOV	BX,RENAMEDMA+21		; Source of replace chars
 19354 00002DFD BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1		; Real dest name goes here
 19355 00002E00 BE[5705]                	MOV	SI,NAME2		; Raw dest
 19356                                  
 19357 00002E03 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 19358                                  
 19359                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19360                                  
 19361                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19362 00002E06 E81401                  	CALL	NEW_RENAME		;IFS. replace ? chars	;AN000;
 19363                                  
 19364                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19365                                  
 19366                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19367                                  ; MSDOS 6.0 
 19368                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19369                                  ;Procedure: NEW_RENAME
 19370                                  ;
 19371                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19372                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 19373                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 19374                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 19375                                  ;	   put in destination string
 19376                                  ;Output: ES:DI-> new string
 19377                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19378                                  ;
 19379                                  ;NEW_RENAME:
 19380                                  ;NEWNAM:
 19381                                  ;	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 341Ah
 19382                                  ;	LODSB
 19383                                  ;	CMP	AL,"?"
 19384                                  ;	JNZ	short NOCHG
 19385                                  ;	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 19386                                  ;NOCHG:
 19387                                  ;	STOSB
 19388                                  ;	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 19389                                  ;	LOOP	NEWNAM
 19390                                  ;	; MSDOS 6.0
 19391                                  ;	;retn
 19392                                  
 19393                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19394                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 19395 00002E09 C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_all	; Stop duplicates with any attributes
 19396 00002E0E C606[7E05]FF            	MOV	byte [CREATING],0FFH
 19397 00002E13 E89B1D                  	call	DEVNAME 		; Check if we built a device name
 19398 00002E16 7396                    	JNC	short BAD_ACC
 19399                                  	;;;
 19400                                  	; 31/01/2024
 19401                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19402 00002E18 8B1E[E60A]              	mov	bx,[DESTSTART_HW]
 19403 00002E1C 891E[EE0A]              	mov	[ROOTCLUST_HW],bx
 19404                                  	;;;
 19405 00002E20 8B1E[6405]              	MOV	BX,[DESTSTART]
 19406 00002E24 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 19407 00002E28 E8A219                  	call	SETDIRSRCH		; Reset search to start of dir
 19408 00002E2B 7281                    	JC	short BAD_ACC 		; Screw up
 19409 00002E2D E87F17                  	call	FINDENTRY		; See if new name already exists
 19410                                  	;JNC	short BAD_ACC 		; Error if found
 19411                                  	; 31/01/2024
 19412 00002E30 7346                    	jnc	short BAD_ACCJ
 19413 00002E32 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 19414 00002E37 753F                    	JNZ	short BAD_ACCJ		; Find failed because user FAILed to I 24
 19415 00002E39 A1[6405]                	MOV	AX,[DESTSTART]		; DIRSTART of dest
 19416                                  	;;;
 19417                                  	; 31/01/2024
 19418 00002E3C 8B16[E60A]              	mov	dx,[DESTSTART_HW]
 19419 00002E40 C42E[8A05]              	les	bp,[THISDPB]
 19420 00002E44 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 19421                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 19422 00002E49 7506                    	jnz	short builddst_1	; not FAT32
 19423 00002E4B 3B16[3106]              	cmp	dx,[RENAMEDMA+17]	; DIRSTART_HW of source
 19424 00002E4F 7506                    	jne	short builddst_2
 19425                                  builddst_1:
 19426                                  	;;;
 19427 00002E51 3B06[2F06]              	CMP	AX,[RENAMEDMA+15]	; DIRSTART of source
 19428 00002E55 7451                    	JZ	short SIMPLE_RENAME	; If =, just give new name
 19429                                  builddst_2:	; 31/01/2024
 19430                                  	;mov	al,[RENAMEDMA+32]
 19431 00002E57 A0[4006]                	MOV	AL,[RENAMEDMA+21+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 19432 00002E5A A810                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory ; 10h
 19433 00002E5C 751A                    	JNZ	short BAD_ACCJ		; Can only do a simple rename on dirs,
 19434                                  					; otherwise the . and .. entries get
 19435                                  					; wiped.
 19436 00002E5E A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 19437 00002E61 8C1E[A005]              	MOV	[THISSFT+2],DS
 19438                                  
 19439                                  ;hkn; AUXSTACK is in DOSDATA
 19440                                  	;mov	si,RENAMEDMA+145h
 19441 00002E65 BE[6507]                	MOV	SI,AUXSTACK-SF_ENTRY.size ; RENAMEDMA+325
 19442 00002E68 8936[9E05]              	MOV	[THISSFT],SI
 19443                                  	;mov	word [SI+2],2
 19444 00002E6C C744020200              	MOV	word [SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 19445 00002E71 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX			; Set "device ID" for call into makenode
 19446 00002E73 E89122                  	call	RENAME_MAKE		; This is in mknode
 19447 00002E76 7303                    	JNC	short GOT_DEST
 19448                                  BAD_ACCJ:
 19449 00002E78 E933FF                  	JMP	BAD_ACC
 19450                                  
 19451                                  GOT_DEST:
 19452 00002E7B 53                      	push	bx
 19453 00002E7C C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; RENAME_MAKE entered this into sharing
 19454 00002E80 E83C52                  	call	ShareEnd		; we need to remove it.
 19455 00002E83 5B                      	pop	bx
 19456                                  
 19457                                  ; A zero length entry with the correct new name has now been made at
 19458                                  ;   [CURBUF+2]:BX.
 19459                                  
 19460 00002E84 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 19461                                  
 19462                                  ; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19463                                  %if 0
 19464                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19465                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 19466                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19467                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 19468                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty1		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 19469                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 19470                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 19471                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 19472                                  yesdirty1:
 19473                                  %else
 19474                                  	; 31/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19475 00002E88 E88F39                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 19476                                  %endif
 19477 00002E8B 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19478                                  	;add	di,11
 19479 00002E8D 83C70B                  	ADD	DI,dir_entry.dir_attr	; Skip name
 19480                                  
 19481                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19482                                  	;mov	si,RENAMEDMA+32 ; 05/07/2024
 19483 00002E90 BE[4006]                	MOV	SI,RENAMEDMA+21+dir_entry.dir_attr
 19484                                  	;mov	cx,21
 19485 00002E93 B91500                  	MOV	CX,dir_entry.size-dir_entry.dir_attr
 19486 00002E96 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB
 19487 00002E98 E85C00                  	CALL	GET_SOURCE
 19488 00002E9B 7257                    	JC	short RENAME_OVER
 19489 00002E9D 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19490 00002E9F 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 19491 00002EA3 B0E5                    	MOV	AL,DIRFREE ; 0E5h
 19492 00002EA5 AA                      	STOSB				; "free" the source
 19493 00002EA6 EB13                    	JMP	SHORT DIRTY_IT
 19494                                  
 19495                                  SIMPLE_RENAME:
 19496 00002EA8 E84C00                  	CALL	GET_SOURCE		; Get the source back
 19497 00002EAB 7247                    	JC	short RENAME_OVER
 19498 00002EAD 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX

 19505                                  DIRTY_IT:

 19509                                  %if 0
 19510                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19511                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19512                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 19514                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;

 19517                                  %else

 19520                                  %endif

 19522                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19523                                  ; Check if the source is a directory of file. If directory rename it to the
 19524                                  ; the new name in the Fastopen cache buffer. If file name it has been
 19525                                  ; previously deleted.

 19528                                  ;yesdirty2:	; 31/01/2024
 19529                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 19531 00002EC3 C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;;BN00XPTM. chek if source a dir ;AN000;
 19532                                  	;add	si,21

 19537

 19539                                  	;call	FastOpen_Rename		;;BN00X rename dir entry in fastopen
 19540

 19542                                  	;POP	SI

 19544                                  NOT_DIR2:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19545 00002ED0 5E                      	POP	SI
 19546                                  NOT_DIRTY1:				;;BN00X
 19547                                  NEXT_SOURCE:

 19552                                  ; to enter it before going to RENAME_Next.
 19553

 19586                                  ; Procedure: GET_SOURCE
 19587                                  ;
 19588                                  ; Inputs:

 19591                                  ;	Re-find the source
 19592                                  ; Output:
 19593                                  ;	[CURBUF] set

 19599                                  GET_SOURCE:
 19600                                  	;;;

 19604 00002EFB 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0

 19606 00002EFD 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; > 0 ?
 19607 00002F01 7504                    	jnz	short gs_cont		; yes, it is not FAT32

 19609                                  gs_cont:

 19627                                  ;Procedure: NEW_RENAME
 19628                                  ;
 19629                                  ;Input: DS:SI -> raw string with ?
 19630                                  ;	ES:DI -> destination string
 19631                                  ;	DS:BX -> source string
 19632                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 19633                                  ;	   put in destination string
 19634                                  ;Output: ES:DI-> new string
 19635                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 19637                                  NEW_RENAME:
 19638                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19639                                  NEWNAM:
 19640                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19641 00002F1D AC                      	LODSB
 19642 00002F1E 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?" ; 3Fh
 19643 00002F20 7502                    	JNZ	short NOCHG
 19644 00002F22 8A07                    	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 19645                                  NOCHG:
 19646 00002F24 AA                      	STOSB
 19647 00002F25 43                      	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 19648 00002F26 E2F5                    	LOOP	NEWNAM
 19649                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19650                                  gs_ret_label:	; 18/12/2022
 19651 00002F28 C3                      	retn

 19659                                  ;**	Low level routines for returning file information and setting file
 19660                                  ;	attributes
 19661                                  ;

 19666                                  ;

 19668                                  ;

 19670                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.
 19671                                  ;
 19672                                  
 19673                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19674                                  
 19675                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19676                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19677                                  ;
 19678                                  ; Inputs:
 19679                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19680                                  ;		terminated)
 19681                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19682                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19683                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19684                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19685                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19686                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19687                                  ; Function:
 19688                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19689                                  ; Returns:
 19690                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19691                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19692                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19693                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19694                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19695                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19696                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19697                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19698                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19699                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19700                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19701                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19702                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19703                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19704                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19705                                  
 19706                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19707                                  
 19708                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 19709                                  
 19710                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 19711                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19712                                  
 19713 00002F29 E8EEE8                  	call	TestNet
 19714 00002F2C 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 19715                                  
 19716                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19717                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 19718                                  ;ELSE
 19719                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 19720                                  ;	INT	2FH
 19721                                  ;	return
 19722                                  
 19723 00002F2E B80F11                  	mov     ax, 110Fh
 19724 00002F31 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19725                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19726                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19727                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = file attributes
 19728 00002F33 C3                      	retn
 19729                                  ;ENDIF
 19730                                  
 19731                                  LOCAL_INFO:
 19732 00002F34 E861E9                  	call	ECritDisk
 19733 00002F37 C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1	; if we find a dir, don't change to it
 19734                                  
 19735                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 19736                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19737 00002F3C E83B1A                  	call	GETPATH
 19738                                  
 19739                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 19740                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19741                                  	;call	GET_FAST_PATH
 19742                                  
 19743                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19744 00002F3F 7312                    	JNC	short info_check_dev
 19745                                  NO_PATH:
 19746 00002F41 750B                    	JNZ	short bad_path1
 19747 00002F43 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 19748 00002F45 7407                    	JZ	short bad_path1
 19749                                  info_no_file:
 19750 00002F47 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 19751                                  BadRet:
 19752 00002F4A F9                      	STC
 19753                                  JustRet:
 19754                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19755                                  	;retn
 19756                                  	; 18/12/2022
 19757 00002F4B E977E9                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19758                                  
 19759                                  bad_path1:
 19760 00002F4E B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 19761 00002F51 EBF7                    	jmp	short BadRet
 19762                                  
 19763                                  info_check_dev:
 19764 00002F53 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 19765 00002F55 78F0                    	JS	short info_no_file	; device
 19766                                  
 19767                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19768                                  ;SR;
 19769                                  ; If root dir then CurBuf == -1. Check for this case and return subdir attr
 19770                                  ;for a root dir
 19771                                  
 19772 00002F57 833E[E205]FF            	cmp	word [CURBUF],-1	;is it a root dir?
 19773 00002F5C 7506                    	jne	short not_root		;no, CurBuf ptr is valid
 19774                                  
 19775 00002F5E 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 19776 00002F60 B010                    	mov	al,attr_directory ; 10h
 19777                                  	;clc
 19778                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19779                                  	; (DOSCODE:683Eh)
 19780                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19781                                  	;clc
 19782 00002F62 EBE7                    	jmp	short JustRet
 19783                                  
 19784                                  not_root:
 19785                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19786 00002F64 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 19787 00002F65 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 19788 00002F69 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19789 00002F6B 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			; Assume size=0 (dir)
 19790 00002F6D 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 19791                                  	;mov	cx,[si+16h]
 19792 00002F6F 8B4C16                  	MOV	CX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_time]
 19793                                  	;mov	dx,[si+18h]
 19794 00002F72 8B5418                  	MOV	DX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_date]
 19795 00002F75 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 19796                                  	;mov	al,[si+0Bh]
 19797 00002F77 8A440B                  	MOV	AL,[SI+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 19798                                  	;test	al,10h
 19799 00002F7A A810                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory
 19800 00002F7C 7506                    	JNZ	short NO_SIZE
 19801                                  	;mov	di,[si+1Ch]
 19802 00002F7E 8B7C1C                  	MOV	DI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_size_l]
 19803                                  	;mov	bx,[si+1Eh]
 19804 00002F81 8B5C1E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_size_h]
 19805                                  NO_SIZE:
 19806 00002F84 1F                      	POP	DS
 19807                                  	;CLC
 19808                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19809                                  	; (DOSCODE:6864h)
 19810                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19811                                  	;clc
 19812 00002F85 EBC4                    	jmp	short JustRet
 19813                                  
 19814                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 19815                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19816                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19817                                  ; Inputs:
 19818                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19819                                  ;		terminated)
 19820                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19821                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19822                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19823                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19824                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19825                                  ;	[SATTRIB] is attribute of search (determines what files may be found)
 19826                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 19827                                  ; Function:
 19828                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 19829                                  ; Returns:
 19830                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19831                                  ;	    No error
 19832                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19833                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19834                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19835                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19836                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19837                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19838                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19839                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19840                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19841                                  ;			Attempt to set an attribute which cannot be set
 19842                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 19843                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19844                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 19845                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 19846                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 19847                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19849                                  
 19850                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19851                                  
 19852                                  SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE:
 19853                                  
 19854                                  ;hkn; set_file_attr is called from file.asm. DS has been set 
 19855                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19856                                  
 19857 00002F87 A9D8FF                  	TEST	AX,~attr_changeable ; 0FFD8h
 19858 00002F8A 7412                    	JZ	short set_look
 19859                                  _BAD_ACC:
 19860                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 19861                                  	;;;
 19862                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19863                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19864 00002F8C E83FE3                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 19865                                  	;;;
 19866 00002F8F C606[2703]07            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_CLASS],errCLASS_Apperr ; 7
 19867 00002F94 C606[2603]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_ACTION],errACT_Abort ; 4
 19868 00002F99 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied ; 5
 19869 00002F9C F9                      	STC
 19870 00002F9D C3                      	retn
 19871                                  	
 19872                                  set_look:
 19873 00002F9E E879E8                  	call	TestNet
 19874 00002FA1 7308                    	JNC	short LOCAL_SET
 19875                                  
 19876                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19877                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19878                                  ;ELSE
 19879 00002FA3 50                      	PUSH	AX
 19880                                  	
 19881                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 14
 19882                                  	;INT	2FH
 19883                                  
 19884 00002FA4 B80E11                  	mov     ax, 110Eh
 19885 00002FA7 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - SET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 19886                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 19887                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19888                                  			; STACK: WORD new file attributes
 19889                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19890                                  
 19891 00002FA9 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 19892 00002FAA C3                      	retn
 19893                                  ;ENDIF
 19894                                  
 19895                                  LOCAL_SET:
 19896 00002FAB E8EAE8                  	call	ECritDisk
 19897 00002FAE 50                      	PUSH	AX			; Save new attributes
 19898 00002FAF C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1	; if we find a dir, don't change to it
 19899 00002FB4 E8C319                  	call	GETPATH 		; get path through fastopen if there	;AC000;
 19900 00002FB7 7308                    	JNC	short set_check_device
 19901 00002FB9 5B                      	POP	BX			; Clean stack (don't zap AX)
 19902 00002FBA EB85                    	JMP	short NO_PATH
 19903                                  
 19904                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19905                                  cannot_set_root:			; M025:
 19906 00002FBC B80500                  	mov	ax,error_access_denied	; M025: return error is attempting
 19907                                  	;stc				; M025: to set attr. of root
 19908                                  	;jmp	short OK_BYE		; M025:
 19909                                  	; 01/02/2024
 19910 00002FBF EB89                    	jmp	short BadRet
 19911                                  
 19912                                  set_check_device:
 19913 00002FC1 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 19914 00002FC3 7906                    	JNS	short set_check_share
 19915 00002FC5 58                      	POP	AX

 19917 00002FC9 EBC1                    	JMP	short _BAD_ACC 		; device
 19918                                  
 19919                                  set_check_share:
 19920 00002FCB 58                      	POP	AX			; Get new attributes
 19921                                  
 19922                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19923 00002FCC 833E[E205]FF            	cmp	word [CURBUF], -1	; M025: Q: is this the root dir
 19924 00002FD1 74E9                    	je	short cannot_set_root	; M025: Y: return error
 19925                                  
 19926                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19927 00002FD3 E89EFC                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19928 00002FD6 7305                    	JNC	short set_do
 19929 00002FD8 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation ; 32
 19930 00002FDB EB1B                    	jmp	short OK_BYE
 19931                                  
 19932                                  set_do:
 19933                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19934 00002FDD C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 19935 00002FE1 2680670BD8              	AND	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],~attr_changeable ; 0D8h
 19936 00002FE6 2608470B                	OR	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],AL
 19937                                  
 19938                                  ; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19939                                  %if 0
 19940                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19941                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 19942                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 19943                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty3		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 19944                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 19945                                  	
 19946                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 19947                                  yesdirty3:
 19948                                  %else
 19949                                  	; 01/02/2024
 19950                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19951 00002FEA E82D38                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 19952                                  %endif
 19953 00002FED A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 19954                                  
 19955                                  ;;;; 10/1/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 19956                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 19957                                  	;PUSH	DX
 19958                                  	;PUSH	DI
 19959                                  	;MOV	AH,0		  ; dir entry update
 19960                                  	;MOV	DL,AL		  ; drive number A=0,B=1,,

 19962                                  	;call	FastOpen_Update
 19963                                  	;POP	DI
 19964                                  	;POP	DX
 19965                                  ;;;; 9/11/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 19966                                  
 19967 00002FF0 E80137                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 19968 00002FF3 7303                    	JNC	short OK_BYE
 19969 00002FF5 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 19970                                  OK_BYE:
 19971                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19972                                  	;retn

 19974 00002FF8 E9CAE8                  	jmp	LCritDisk

 19981                                  
 19982                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 19983                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 19984                                  ;
 19985                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 19986                                  ;
 19987                                  ;	Modification history:
 19988                                  ;
 19989                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19990                                  
 19991                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 19992                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19993                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 19994                                  ;
 19995                                  ; Inputs:
 19996                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 19997                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 19998                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 19999                                  ; Function:
 20000                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20001                                  ; Returns:
 20002                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20003                                  ;    Carry clear
 20004                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20005                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20006                                  ; NOTE:
 20007                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20008                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20009                                  ;	that time.
 20010                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20011                                  
 20012                                  DOS_DUP:
 20013                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20014                                  
 20015                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20016 00002FFB 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20017 00003000 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20018                                  
 20019                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20020                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20021 00003005 E82BE8                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20022 00003008 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20023 0000300A E8A01E                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20024                                  DO_INC:
 20025                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20026 0000300D 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20027                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20028 00003010 C3                      	retn
 20029
