 29462                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 29463                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29464                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 29465                                  ;
 29466                                  ; Inputs:
 29467                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 29468                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29469                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29470                                  ; Function:
 29471                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 29472                                  ; Outputs:
 29473                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB

 29540                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.

 29734                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 29735                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 29736                                  
 29737                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 29738                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29739                                  ;
 29740                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 29741                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 29742                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 29743                                  ;
 29744                                  ;	[path]device
 29745                                  ;
 29746                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 29747                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 29748                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 29749                                  ;
 29750                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29751                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 29752                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29753                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 29754                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 29755                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 29756                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 29757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29758                                  
 29759                                  CheckThisDevice:
 29760 00004D0A 57                      	push	di
 29761 00004D0B 56                      	push	si
 29762 00004D0C 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29763                                  
 29764                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 29765                                  
 29766 00004D0E 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 29767 00004D10 E8330D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 29768 00004D13 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 29769 00004D15 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 29770                                  
 29771                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 29772                                  
 29773 00004D16 AD                      	LODSW
 29774 00004D17 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 29775 00004D1A 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 29776                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 29777 00004D1D 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 29778 00004D1F AC                      	LODSB
 29779 00004D20 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 29780 00004D22 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 29781 00004D24 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 29782 00004D26 AC                      	LODSB
 29783 00004D27 E81C0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 29784 00004D2A 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 29785                                  
 29786                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 29787                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 29788                                  
 29789                                  ParseDev:
 29790 00004D2C 1E                      	push	ds
 29791 00004D2D 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 29792 00004D2E E8590C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 29793 00004D31 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 29794 00004D34 F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 29795 00004D35 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 29796                                  
 29797                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29798 00004D37 16                      	push	ss
 29799 00004D38 1F                      	pop	ds
 29800                                  
 29801                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 29802                                  ;
 29803                                  ; SR;
 29804                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 29805                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 29806                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 29807                                  
 29808 00004D39 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 29809 00004D3C A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 29810                                  
 29811                                  ; M026 - end
 29812                                  
 29813 00004D3F E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 29814                                  
 29815                                  SkipSearch:
 29816 00004D42 5E                      	pop	si
 29817 00004D43 1F                      	pop	ds
 29818                                  
 29819                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 29820                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 29821                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 29822                                  
 29823                                  CheckReturn:
 29824 00004D44 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 29825 00004D45 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 29826 00004D47 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 29827                                  Check_Done:
 29828 00004D49 5F                      	pop	di
 29829 00004D4A F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 29830 00004D4B C3                      	retn
 29831                                  NotDevice:
 29832 00004D4C F9                      	STC
 29833 00004D4D EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn

 29885                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29886                                  ;
 29887                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 29888                                  ;
 29889                                  ; Inputs:
 29890                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 29891                                  ;	AH is function code
 29892                                  ;		= 0 Input
 29893                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 29894                                  ;		= 2 Output
 29895                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 29896                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 29897                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 29898                                  ;				   present.
 29899                                  ;	AL = character if output
 29900                                  ; Function:
 29901                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 29902                                  ; Outputs:
 29903                                  ;	AL is character if input
 29904                                  ;	If a status call
 29905                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 29906                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 29907                                  ; For regular files:
 29908                                  ;	Input Status
 29909                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 29910                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 29911                                  ;	Input
 29912                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 29913                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 29914                                  ;	Output Status
 29915                                  ;		Always ready
 29916                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved

 30532 00004FB6 16                      	PUSH	SS
 30533 00004FB7 07                      	POP	ES
 30534                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 30535 00004FB8 BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 30536                                  
 30537 00004FBB AA                      	STOSB				; length

 30540 00004FBE 50                      	PUSH	AX

 30545 00004FC5 83C708                  	ADD	DI,8			; Skip link fields

 30595                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30596                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30597                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30598                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30599                                  
 30600                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30601                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30602                                  ;
 30603                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30604                                  ;
 30605                                  ; Inputs:
 30606                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30607                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30608                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30609                                  ; Function:
 30610                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30611                                  ; Output:
 30612                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30613                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30614                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30615                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30616                                  ;
 30617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30618                                  
 30619                                  RW_SC:
 30620                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30621                                  	
 30622                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30623                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30624                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30625                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30626                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30627                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30628                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30629                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30630                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30631                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30632                                  
 30633                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30634                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30635                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30636                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30637                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30638                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30639                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30640                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30641                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30642                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30643                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30644                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30645                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30646                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30647                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30648                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30649                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30650                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30651                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30652                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30653                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30654                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30655                                  chklow: 						
 30656                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30657                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30658                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30659                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30660                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30661                                  readsr:
 30662                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30663                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30664                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30665                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30666                                  
 30667                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30668                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30669                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30670                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30671                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30672                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30673                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30674                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30675                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30676                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30677                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30678                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30679                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30680                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30681                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30682                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30683                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30684                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30685                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30686                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30687                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30688                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30689                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30690                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30691                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30692                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30693                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30694                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30695                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30696                                  
 30697                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30698                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30699                                  ;
 30700                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30701                                  ;
 30702                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30703                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30704                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30705                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30706                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30707                                  ; Function:
 30708                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30709                                  ; Output:
 30710                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30711                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30712                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30713                                  ;
 30714                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30715                                  
 30716                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30717                                  IN_SC:
 30718                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30719                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30720                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30721                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30722                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30723                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30724                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30725                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30726                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30727                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30728                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30729                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30730                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30731                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30732                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30733                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30734                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30735                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30736                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30737                                  
 30738                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30739                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30740                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30741                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30742                                  
 30743                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30744                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30745                                  ;
 30746                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30747                                  ;
 30748                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30749                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30750                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30751                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30752                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30753                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30754                                  ;
 30755                                  ; Function:
 30756                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30757                                  ; Output:
 30758                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30759                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30760                                  
 30761                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30762                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30763                                  
 30764                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30765                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30766                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30767                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30768                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30769                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30770                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30771                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30772                                  
 30773                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30774                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30775                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30776                                  
 30777                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30778                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30779                                  ;
 30780                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30781                                  ;
 30782                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30783                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30784                                  ; Function:
 30785                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30786                                  ; Output:
 30787                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30788                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30789                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30790                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30791                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30792                                  ;     
 30793                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30794                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30795                                  
 30796                                  VIRREAD:
 30797                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30798                                  
 30799                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30800                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30801                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30802                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30803                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30804                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30805                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30806                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30807                                  
 30808                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30809                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30810                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30811                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30812                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30813                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30814                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30815                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30816                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30817                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30818                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30819                                  	POP	CX
 30820                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30821                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30822                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30823                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30824                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30825                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30826                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30827                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30828                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30829                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30830                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30831                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30832                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30833                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30834                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30835                                  
 30836                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30837                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30838                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30839                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30840                                  
 30841                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30842                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30843                                  ;
 30844                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30845                                  ;
 30846                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30847                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30848                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30849                                  ; Function:
 30850                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30851                                  ; Output:
 30852                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30853                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30854                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30855                                  
 30856                                  SC2BUF:
 30857                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30858                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30859                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30860                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30861                                  	jc	short sexit
 30862                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30863                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30864                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30865                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30866                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30867                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30868                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30869                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30870                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30871                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30872                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30873                                  	mul	cx
 30874                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30875                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30876                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30877                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30878                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30879                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30880                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30881                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30882                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30883                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30884                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30885                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30886                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30887                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30888                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30889                                  nodd:
 30890                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30891                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30892                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30893                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30894                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30895                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30896                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30897                                  
 30898                                  %endif	; SC

 30907                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 30908                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 30909                                  
 30910                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 30911                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30912                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 30913                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 30914                                  ;
 30915                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 30916                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 30917                                  ;	MakeNode
 30918                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 30919                                  ;	FREEENT
 30920                                  ;	NEWDIR
 30921                                  ;	DOOPEN
 30922                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 30923                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 30924                                  ;
 30925                                  ;	Revision history:
 30926                                  ;
 30927                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 30928                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 30929                                  
 30930                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30931                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30932                                  ;
 30933                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30934                                  ;
 30935                                  ; Inputs:
 30936                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30937                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30938                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30939                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30940                                  ;               entries
 30941                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30942                                  ; Function:
 30943                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30944                                  ; Outputs:
 30945                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30946                                  ;       ELSE
 30947                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30948                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30949                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30950                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30951                                  ;
 30952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30953                                  
 30954                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30955                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30956                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30957                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30958                                  
 30959                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 30960                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 30961                                  
 30962                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30963                                  ; DOSCODE:940Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 30964                                  
 30965                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:890Ch)
 30966                                  
 30967                                  BUILDDIR:
 30968                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 30969                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 30970                                  
 30971 00004FEE A1[D805]                	MOV	AX,[ENTFREE]
 30972 00004FF1 83F8FF                  	CMP	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 30973                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 30974                                  	;CLC
 30975                                  	;retn
 30976                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30977 00004FF4 750E                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)
 30978                                  
 30979                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 30980                                  	; 23/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30981                                  	;;;
 30982 00004FF6 833E[DC0A]00            	cmp	word [DIRSTART_HW],0
 30983 00004FFB 7509                    	jnz	short NEWDIR 
 30984                                  	;;;
 30985 00004FFD 833E[C205]00            	CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 30986 00005002 7502                    	JNZ	short NEWDIR
 30987                                  	;STC				; Can't grow root
 30988                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30989                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 30990                                  builddir_cmc_retn:
 30991                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30992 00005004 F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 30993                                  builddir_retn:
 30994 00005005 C3                      	retn
 30995                                  
 30996                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 30997                                  NEWDIR: 
 30998                                  	; 23/02/2024
 30999                                  	;;;
 31000 00005006 8B1E[DC0A]              	mov	bx,[DIRSTART_HW]
 31001 0000500A 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 31002 0000500E 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31003                                  	;;;
 31004 00005010 8B1E[C205]              	MOV	BX,[DIRSTART]
 31005                                  	;;;
 31006 00005014 7504                    	jnz	short NEWDIR2 ; 23/02/2024
 31007                                  	;;;
 31008 00005016 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 31009 00005018 7405                    	JZ	short NULLDIR
 31010                                  NEWDIR2:
 31011 0000501A E87A08                  	call	GETEOF
 31012 0000501D 72E6                    	jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 31013                                  NULLDIR:
 31014                                  	;MOV	CX,1
 31015                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31016                                  	;;;
 31017 0000501F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31018 00005021 890E[F00A]              	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],cx ; 0
 31019 00005025 41                      	inc	cx ; 1
 31020                                  	;;;
 31021 00005026 E81606                  	call	ALLOCATE
 31022 00005029 72DA                    	jc	short builddir_retn
 31023 0000502B 8B16[C205]              	MOV	DX,[DIRSTART]
 31024                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31025                                  	;;;
 31026 0000502F 3B16[DC0A]              	cmp	dx,[DIRSTART_HW]
 31027 00005033 7519                    	jnz	short ADDINGDIR
 31028                                  	;;;
 31029 00005035 09D2                    	OR	DX,DX
 31030 00005037 7515                    	JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 31031                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31032                                  	;;;
 31033 00005039 FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31034 0000503D 8F06[EE0A]              	pop	word [ROOTCLUST_HW]
 31035                                  	;;;
 31036 00005041 E889F7                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 31037 00005044 72BF                    	jc	short builddir_retn
 31038 00005046 C706[4803]FFFF          	MOV	word [LASTENT],-1
 31039 0000504C EB2E                    	JMP	SHORT GOTDIRREC
 31040                                  ADDINGDIR:
 31041 0000504E 53                      	PUSH    BX
 31042                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31043                                  	;;;
 31044 0000504F FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31045                                  	;
 31046 00005053 8B1E[DE0A]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 31047 00005057 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 31048                                  	;;;
 31049 0000505B 8B1E[BC05]              	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 31050 0000505F E8B20E                  	call	IsEOF
 31051                                  	;;;
 31052 00005062 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; 23/02/2024
 31053                                  	;;;
 31054 00005066 5B                      	POP	BX
 31055 00005067 720C                    	JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 31056                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31057 00005069 891E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],BX
 31058                                  
 31059                                  ; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 31060                                  %if 0
 31061                                  
 31062                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31063                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 31064                                  	PUSH	AX
 31065                                  	PUSH	BP
 31066                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31067                                  	;;;
 31068                                  	mov	ax,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31069                                  	mov	[CLUSNUM_HW],ax
 31070                                  	;;;
 31071                                  	MOV	AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 31072                                  	; 15/12/2022
 31073                                  	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 31074                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31075                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 31076                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 31077                                  	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 31078                                  	MOV	BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 31079                                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 31080                                  	POP	BP
 31081                                  	POP	AX
 31082                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31083                                  	;POP	CX
 31084                                  
 31085                                  %endif
 31086                                  	; 03/03/2025 (MiniDOS)
 31087 0000506D 8B16[E80A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 31088 00005071 8916[DE0A]              	mov	[CLUSNUM_HW],dx
 31089                                  
 31090                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31091                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 31092 00005075 89DA                    	MOV	DX,BX
 31093 00005077 30DB                    	XOR	BL,BL
 31094 00005079 E88805                  	call	FIGREC
 31095                                  GOTDIRREC:
 31096                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 31097 0000507C 268A4E04                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 31098                                  	;INC	CL
 31099                                  	; 27/06/2024
 31100 00005080 41                      	inc	cx
 31101 00005081 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 31102                                  ZERODIR:
 31103 00005083 51                      	PUSH    CX
 31104                                  	; 22/09/2023
 31105                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 31106                                  	;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 31107 00005084 B0FF                    	MOV	AL,0FFH
 31108                                  	;call	GETBUFFR
 31109 00005086 E8FE14                  	call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 31110 00005089 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 31111 0000508B 59                      	POP	CX
 31112 0000508C C3                      	retn
 31113                                  
 31114                                  GET_SSIZE:
 31115                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 31116 0000508D 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 31117 00005091 06                      	PUSH    ES
 31118 00005092 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 31119                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 31120 00005096 26804D0504              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 31121 0000509B 57                      	PUSH    DI
 31122                                  	;;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 31123                                  	;;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 31124                                  	;add	di,24	; PCDOS 7.1 ; 23/02/2024
 31125 0000509C 83C718                  	ADD	DI,BUFINSIZ
 31126 0000509F 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 31127 000050A1 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1
 31128 000050A3 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31129 000050A5 7301                    	JNC	short EVENZ
 31130 000050A7 AA                      	STOSB
 31131                                  EVENZ:
 31132 000050A8 5F                      	POP	DI
 31133                                  
 31134                                  ; 23/02/2024
 31135                                  %if 0
 31136                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31137                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31138                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 31139                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 31140                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 31141                                  	
 31142                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31143                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31144                                  %else
 31145                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31146 000050A9 E86E17                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 31147                                  %endif
 31148                                  
 31149                                  yesdirty7:
 31150 000050AC 07                      	POP	ES
 31151 000050AD 59                      	POP	CX
 31152                                  
 31153                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31154                                  
 31155                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 31156                                  	;INC	DX
 31157                                  
 31158                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31159                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31160                                  	;add	dx,1
 31161                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 31162                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 31163                                  	;; ax=0
 31164                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 31165                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31166 000050AE 42                      	inc	dx
 31167 000050AF 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 31168 000050B1 FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 31169                                  loop_zerodir:
 31170 000050B5 E2CC                    	LOOP	ZERODIR
 31171                                  
 31172 000050B7 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 31173 000050BA 40                      	INC	AX
 31174                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31175                                  	; cf=0
 31176                                  	;CLC
 31177 000050BB C3                      	retn
 31178                                  
 31179                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31180                                  ;
 31181                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31182                                  ;
 31183                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31184                                  ;
 31185                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31186                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31187                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31188                                  ;
 31189                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31190                                  
 31191                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31192                                  
 31193                                  SETDOTENT:
 31194                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31195 000050BC AB                      	STOSW
 31196 000050BD B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31197 000050C0 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31198 000050C3 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31199 000050C5 AA                      	STOSB
 31200                                  
 31201                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31202                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31203 000050C6 B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31204 000050C8 AA                      	STOSB
 31205                                  
 31206                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31207                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31208                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31209                                  	;;;
 31210 000050C9 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31211 000050CC A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31212 000050CF AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31213                                  	;;;	
 31214 000050D0 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31215                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31216 000050D4 8B440D                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31217 000050D7 AB                      	STOSW
 31218                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31219 000050D8 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31220 000050DB AB                      	STOSW
 31221                                  
 31222                                  ;	Set up first cluster field (lw)
 31223 000050DC 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31224 000050DE AB                      	STOSW
 31225                                  
 31226                                  ;	0 file size
 31227                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31228 000050DF 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; 23/02/2024
 31229 000050E0 AB                      	STOSW
 31230 000050E1 AB                      	STOSW
 31231 000050E2 C3                      	retn
 31232                                  
 31233                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31234                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31235                                  ;
 31236                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31237                                  ;
 31238                                  ; Inputs:
 31239                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31240                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31241                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31242                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31243                                  ;
 31244                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31245                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31246                                  ;
 31247                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31248                                  ;               terminated)
 31249                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31250                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31251                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31252                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31253                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31254                                  ; Function:
 31255                                  ;       Make a new node
 31256                                  ; Outputs:
 31257                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31258                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31259                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31260                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31261                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31262                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31263                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31264                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31265                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31266                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31267                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31268                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31269                                  ;       ELSE
 31270                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31271                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31272                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31273                                  ;               containing new node.
 31274                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31275                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31276                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31277                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31278                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31279                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31280                                  ;
 31281                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31282                                  
 31283                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31284                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31285                                  
 31286                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31287                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31288                                  
 31289                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31290                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31291                                  
 31292                                  MakeNode:
 31293                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31294 000050E3 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31295 000050E9 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31296 000050EA C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31297 000050EF A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31298 000050F2 E88BF8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31299 000050F5 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31300                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31301                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31302 000050F7 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31303 000050F8 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31304 000050F9 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31305 000050FB 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31306 000050FD 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31307 00005100 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31308                                  make_err_4:
 31309 00005102 B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31310                                  make_err_ret:
 31311                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31312                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31313 00005104 98                      	cbw
 31314 00005105 F9                      	STC
 31315                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31316 00005106 C3                      	retn
 31317                                  
 31318                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31319                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31320                                  make_type:
 31321                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31322                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31323                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31324 00005107 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31325 0000510C 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31326 0000510E 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31327                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31328                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31329 00005113 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31330 00005118 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31331 0000511A F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31332 0000511B B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31333                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31334                                  make_retn:
 31335                                  	;return
 31336 0000511E C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31337                                  
 31338                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31339                                  
 31340                                  make_type2:
 31341 0000511F C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31342 00005123 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31343 00005125 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31344 00005126 EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31345                                  
 31346                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31347                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31348                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31349                                  ;   else => file
 31350                                  
 31351                                  make_exists:
 31352 00005128 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31353 0000512A B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31354                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31355 0000512C F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31356 00005131 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31357                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31358                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31359 00005133 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31360 00005135 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31361 00005137 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31362 00005139 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31363 0000513B 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31364 0000513C 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31365                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31366 00005140 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31367                                  	;test	ch,1
 31368 00005144 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31369 00005147 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 31370 00005149 E858FA                  	call	MatchAttributes
 31371 0000514C 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31372 0000514D 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31373 0000514F 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31374                                  make_share:
 31375                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31376                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31377 00005151 98                      	cbw
 31378 00005152 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 31379 00005153 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 31380 00005154 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH
 31381 00005156 E83201                  	CALL	DOOPEN		; Fill in SFT for share check
 31382 00005159 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31383 0000515D 56                      	push	si
 31384 0000515E 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31385 0000515F E8622F                  	call	ShareEnter
 31386 00005162 734E                    	jnc	short MakeEndShare
 31387                                  
 31388                                  ; User failed request.
 31389 00005164 5B                      	pop	bx
 31390 00005165 5E                      	pop	si
 31391 00005166 59                      	pop	cx

 31436                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of

 31468 000051AF 58                      	POP	AX
 31469 000051B0 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31470                                  
 31471                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31472                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31473                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31474                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31475                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31476                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31477                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31478                                  ;
 31479                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31480                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31481                                  
 31482                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31483                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31484                                  
 31485                                  MakeEndShare:

 31498 000051C7 5F                      	pop	di

 31500                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]

 31503                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31504 000051CE 5B                      	pop	bx
 31505 000051CF 5E                      	pop	si
 31506 000051D0 59                      	pop	cx
 31507 000051D1 58                      	pop	ax
 31508 000051D2 E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 31509                                  
 31510                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31511

 31514 000051D8 53                      	push	bx

 31528                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31529                                  ;
 31530                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31531                                  ;
 31532                                  ; Inputs:
 31533                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31534                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31535                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31536                                  ;		  entries
 31537                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31538                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31539                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31540                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31541                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31542                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31543                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31544                                  ;	  If FILE
 31545                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31546                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31547                                  ;	  If device
 31548                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31549                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31550                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31551                                  ; Function:
 31552                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31553                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31554                                  ; Outputs:
 31555                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31556                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31557                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31558                                  ;	  else
 31559                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31560                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31561                                  ;
 31562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31563                                  
 31564                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31565                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31566                                  
 31567                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31568                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31569                                  
 31570                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31571                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31572                                  
 31573                                  NEWENTRY:

 31715                                  ; DOOPEN
 31716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31717                                  ;
 31718                                  ; Inputs:
 31719                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31720                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31721                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31722                                  ;	  If FILE
 31723                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31724                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31725                                  ;	  If device
 31726                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31727                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31728                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31729                                  ; Function:
 31730                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31731                                  ; Outputs:
 31732                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31733                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31734                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31735                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31736                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31737                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31738                                  ;	  sf_position = 0

 31740                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31741                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 31742                                  ;	  If file
 31743                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31744                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31745                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 31746                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31747                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31748                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31749                                  ;
 31750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31751                                  
 31752                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31753                                  	; DOSCODE:96C3h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)

 32018                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32019                                  ;
 32020                                  ; Inputs:
 32021                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32022                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32023                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32024                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32025                                  ; Function:
 32026                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32027                                  ; Outputs:
 32028                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32029                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32030                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32031                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32032                                  
 32033                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32034                                  	; 24/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 32127                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32128                                  ;
 32129                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32130                                  ;
 32131                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32132                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32133                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32134                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32135                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32136                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32137                                  ;
 32138                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32139                                  
 32140                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32141                                  	PUSH	AX
 32142                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32143                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32144                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32145                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32146                                  	push	es
 32147                                  	push	di
 32148                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32149                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32150                                  	pop	di
 32151                                  	pop	es
 32152                                  
 32153                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32154                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32155                                  	POP	AX
 32156                                  	retn
 32157                                  
 32158                                  %endif

 32195                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32196                                  ;
 32197                                  ; Inputs:

 32344                                  
 32345 0000540E FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32346 00005412 53                      	push	bx
 32347 00005413 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 32348 00005415 8B3E[EC0A]              	mov	di,[CCONTENT_HW]
 32349 00005419 893E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],di
 32350 0000541D E8F40A                  	call	IsEOF

 32356 00005427 C3                      	retn
 32357                                  
 32358                                  SKPCLP2:
